Database¶

Database manipulation class.

Database manager¶

Handle database basic operation using sqlalchemy.

Logs all error in exception object. exception.logger: logger object. exception.message: error message.

class database_manager.DatabaseManager(configuration, prefix='', **kwargs)¶

Manage database interaction, Logs all error.

add(entity)¶

Add one entity into current database, flush and expunge it. Raise and log exception in case of error.

Parameters:entity (obj) – Entity class with data to feed database.
add_all(entities)¶

Add list of entity into current database, flush and expunge it. Raise and log exception in case of error.

Parameters:entities (list) – List of entity class with data to feed.
bulk_insert_mappings(obj, data)¶

Execute a bulk insert of data.

Parameters:
  • obj (obj) – Class representing table schema.
  • data (list) – list of dict representing data to add.
bulk_save_objects(data, return_defaults=False)¶

Execute a bulk save of data.

Parameters:data (list) – list of table object with data to add.
create_schema(name)¶

Create given schema, log and raise exception in case of error.

Parameters:name (str) – name of schema.
create_table_obj(name, *, schema=None, autoload=True)¶

Create an sqlalchemy table object.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – name of table.
  • schema (str) – table schema name. Default to None.
  • autoload (bool) – autoload table structure. Default to True.
delete(entity, merge=False)¶

Delete one entry, raise and log exception in case of error.

Parameters:entity (obj) – Entity instance to delete.
drop_schema(name)¶

Drop given schema, log and raise exception in case of error.

Parameters:name (str) – name of schema.
entity_exists(filter)¶

Check if an entity exists on given filter, raise exception in case of error.

Parameters:entity (obj) – filter to apply to where clause.
Returns:True if exists otherwise False.
map_tables(tables, *, schema=None)¶

Map tables into python object, log and raise exception in case of error.

Parameters:
  • tables (list) – list of tables name to map.
  • schema (str) – table schema name. Default to None.
Returns:

list of python object containing tables schemas.
read(table)¶

Read all entry for one table, expunge and return it. Raise and log exception in case of error.

Parameters:table (obj) – Entity class with table schema.
Returns:list of database entry as entity class. None in case of error.
schema_exists(name)¶

Check if schema exists.

Parameters:name (str) – schema name.
Returns:True if exists otherwise False.
session(*, raise_err=True, session_config=None)¶

Context manager for session, yield a session then commit, in case of error log exception and rollback session.

Parameters:
  • raise_err (bool) – raise exception in case of error if True. Default to True.
  • session_config (dict) – session configuration.
update(entity, keys)¶

Update entity, select by id. Raise and log exception in case of error.

Parameters:entity (obj) – entity object to update.
Paran list keys:
 list of keys to update.

Database singleton¶

Singleton who store a database manager.

class database_singleton.DatabaseSingleton(configuration, prefix='', **kwargs)¶

Singleton for database manager. Use this class like a DatabaseManager.

Attr instance:_DatabaseSingleton instance.
